articles.author: Meg Wingerter
articles.title: Boulder County resident exposed Flatiron Flyer passengers to measles - The Denver Post
articles.description: A Boulder County resident who recently traveled to Europe returned with measles, becoming the state’s 15th case this year.
articles.content: People who took the Regional Transportation District’s Flatiron Flyer between Boulder and Denver last week should watch for measles symptoms after a contagious Boulder County resident rode that route… [+2224 chars]

articles.author: Harry Baker
articles.title: Friday the 13th solar storm could bring auroras to 18 US states this weekend - Live Science
articles.description: Space weather experts warn that a "moderate" geomagnetic storm could rock Earth over the weekend, potentially lighting the skies with vibrant auroras across large parts of the U.S. and Europe.
articles.content:
Skywatchers in up to 18 U.S. states could witness auroras
 in the coming days as a "moderate" geomagnetic storm rocks Earth's magnetic field, starting on Friday (June 13).
